title: Airwheel M3 Pro Electric Skateboards Complete
text: Airwheel M3 Pro Electric Skateboards Complete , 24 October 2015 -- In modern society, people in increasing numbers are in pursuit of innovation and individuality.Many people tend to experience the exciting experiences by trying various challenging events, skydiving, bungy jumping and underwater diving are included. In modern society, people in increasing numbers are in pursuit of innovation and individuality. Airwheel Technology keeps pace with the development of science and technology by releasing latest products to meet the demands of consumers. Airwheel M3 electric skateboard is one of them. The unique designs of Airwheel M3 electric skateboards include but not limited to the double battery protection boards which guarantee the normal operation of the battery, and avoid causing damage to cell; the TPU material damper mass with good physical performance and strong anti-tensile strength; 2.4G handheld wireless remote control letting your hands control your own directions instead of pursuing of speed in online game world with hands; magnetic levitation motor, which brings more powerful output power with the speed of 20 miles per hour and more than 30Â°climbing degree and makes it ulta-quiet with 1000 turns by leaving out bearing and reducing friction. Thanks to the cooperation of world-famous brand-Cheng Shin Tire, It is adopted the customized tires into M3 maple electric skateboard with such features as skid proof, strong grip effect, wide tire design, which is suitable for the whole road conditions. It not only shows individuality but also ensures safety because it put an end to explosion, leakage or breaking. With the modular design, you can DIY following your heart which give you a full display of your innovation and creation. It can be modified and realize personal "transformation". You can experience more possibilities and travel freely. The control chip, installed in the internal part of motorized skateboard M3, will collect data throughout the vehicle, and transmit to the phone wirelessly. The visualization data through instant analysis computation, can be feed backed to the user by mobile phone APP in real-time. Innovation and individuality is no longer a dream. We can make it by Airwheel M3 wireless remote control skateboard. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world. Media Contact: Company Name: Airwheel Technology Holding Co., Ltd Contact Person: Mr Tang Address: FL9 Zhongchuang, 396 Tongjiang Road, Changzhou, Jiangsu, China E-mail:
